3: Explosions! All members, be on the alert!
I've located where the detonation signal came from!
We can make it in time if we surround them now!
Let's do this!
With the residue heat from the faraway explosions still palpable in the air, Vera stands in front of the entrance to the aquarium corridor.
We cool being this up front about it?
Them Gray Ravens might take this the wrong way, yeah?
You make it sound like a bad thing. I'll get more toys this way, right?
Successfully blocked two possible routes. Target should be contained for thirty minutes.
That's more than enough. Let's begin.
Oh, wait, situation update.
The birds are flying faster than we thought they could.
The footsteps of you and your companions announce your arrival. You and the others surround Vera from two ends.
You!
Why are you here?!
Hah. What does that have to do with you?
If you're here... Then that means Commander Nikola is...
Yeah? What's it got to do with you, then, Kurono deserter?
Don't get me wrong, there are times when I envy you.
At least your little birdcage seems to be giving you some inner peace.
Hey! Vera! I knew it, you caught their attention on purpose!
Stop being a muck-head and get me outta this.
A grenade explodes by Lee's feet, sending up light and smoke.
I ain't reminding y'all on the public channel next time, yeah?
And it won't be these smokers next time round!
After you finally get rid of the smoke, Vera is already nowhere to be found.
The nearby Corrupted seem to be drawn by the explosion and light, and slowly surround you.
Tsk, the same as before. Just makes a mess and never cleans up!
Twenty minutes later...
Oi, you're feelin' kinda different, girl.
...Is it just me, or are you being extra annoying today?
I mean... ya ain't thinking they might be a chance for you to change... or sumthin'?
21, wring his neck.
Aight.
On second thoughts, don't wring it off entirely—guy's still useful.
Aight.
Hey! Was just kidding, mam! Hey, you devil! Don't come closer!
Alright, enough of this nonsense. Blow up all the scheduled sites, and move over to the next target location.
Alright! Blast sites two to sixteen! A full course of dee-na-mee-tay, coming right up!
